subject: RE: [junit] J Unit's textui.TestRunner envoking System.runFinalization();
msgSnippet: Michael, I would like to suggest you make this request on JUnit s developer home page, you can get there by clicking the SourceForge link on junit.org --
messageBody:
Michael,

I would like to suggest you make this request on
JUnit's "developer" home page, you can get there
by clicking the SourceForge link on junit.org

--
Erik Meade emeade@...
Senior Consultant Object Mentor, Inc.
http://www.junit.org

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Michael Forsberg [mailto:forsberg@...]
> Sent: Thursday, February 22, 2001 11:10 AM
> To: J Unit
> Subject: [junit] J Unit's textui.TestRunner envoking
> System.runFinalization();
>
>
> Would it be possible for the next release to add the line
>
> System.runFinalization();
>
> in each main for all TestRunners.
>
> The reason for this enhancement, if it is an enhancement, would be to
> reduce setUp and tearDown between tests.
>
> In using a finalization method a object that needs to exist (or be
> created) for multiple tests could be created once and deleted once
> instead of between each test. This object could reset it's state (as
> in the example below) in a setUp or tearDown but may not need to be
> reinstantiated.
>
> Just a request.
>
> Big Mike
>
>
>
> Example (current snippet)...
>
> ..... inside test class extending TestCase
>
> private static File tempFile;
>
> private static RandomAccessFile raf;
>
> protected void setUp()
> throws IOException {
> tempFile = File.createTempFile("TempFile",null);
> raf = new RandomAccessFile(tempFile, "rw");
> }
>
> protected void tearDown()
> throws IOException {
> raf.close();
> raf = null;
> assert("Fail to delete temp file",
> true,
> tempFile.delete());
> }
>
>
>
>
> could be replaced with
>
> Example (new code snipet)....
>
> ...inside class extending TestCase
>
>
> private static File tempFile;
>
> static {
> try {
> tempFile = createTempFile("TempFile",null);
> } catch (IOException e) {
> throw e.fillInStackTrace();
> }
> }
>
> private static RandomAccessFile raf;
>
> static {
> try {
> raf = new RandomAccessFile(tempFile,"rw");
> } catch (IOException) {
> throw e.fillInStackTrace();
> }
> }
>
> protected void setUp()
> throws IOException {
> raf.seek(0);
> raf.setLength(0);
> }
>
> protected void finalize()
> throws Throwable {
> raf.close();
> raf = null;
> if (!file.delete()) {
> throw IOException("Unable to delete the tempfile.");
> }
> }
>
